step_by_step_reasoning: We are already on a specific category page (Derivatives). To satisfy the task, we can further filter the list by selecting one of the available subcategory filter buttons (e.g., “Perpetuals”). Then sort by the selected metric: 24h change descending. The table headers aren’t shown in the provided accessibility tree, so we will click the 24h column header by role "columnheader" name "24h" and, if needed, click again to ensure descending. We’ll add short waits to allow the table to re-render.
python_code:
import asyncio

async def act(page):
    main = page.get_by_role("main")

    # Filter by a chosen (sub)category within Derivatives: Perpetuals
    await main.get_by_role("button", name="Perpetuals").click()
    await asyncio.sleep(2)

    # Sort by selected metric: 24h change (descending)
    # Click once, then click again to ensure descending order.
    table = main.get_by_role("table")
    header_24h = table.get_by_role("columnheader", name="24h")
    await header_24h.click()
    await asyncio.sleep(1)
    await header_24h.click()
    await asyncio.sleep(2)
formatted_code:
import asyncio

async def act(page):
    main = page.get_by_role("main")

    # Filter by a chosen (sub)category within Derivatives: Perpetuals
    await main.get_by_role("button", name="Perpetuals").click()
    await asyncio.sleep(2)

    # Sort by selected metric: 24h change (descending)
    # Click once, then click again to ensure descending order.
    table = main.get_by_role("table")
    header_24h = table.get_by_role("columnheader", name="24h")
    await header_24h.click()
    await asyncio.sleep(1)
    await header_24h.click()
    await asyncio.sleep(2)

debug.error_function_source:
import asyncio

async def act(page):
    main = page.get_by_role("main")

    # Filter by a chosen (sub)category within Derivatives: Perpetuals
    await main.get_by_role("button", name="Perpetuals").click()
    await asyncio.sleep(2)

    # Sort by selected metric: 24h change (descending)
    # Click once, then click again to ensure descending order.
    table = main.get_by_role("table")
    header_24h = table.get_by_role("columnheader", name="24h")
    await header_24h.click()
    await asyncio.sleep(1)
    await header_24h.click()
    await asyncio.sleep(2)
